::WindRider::
WindRider gazed out across the landscape."We will", he
said to Battera. "Have faith in the Matrix." With that
he reached to put his arm around her.
--- logomorph@... wrote:
> ::Battera:;
> 
> She saw him standing next to her.  She smiled and
> then turned to look 
> out arcross the landscape.  It was a magnificent
> site to see.  She 
> saw animals playing in the tall grasses.  She
> sighed, "It's beautiful 
> here.  I hope we can make peace with the other
> groups before it's all 
> destroyed.  I just hope that peace can be made
> soon."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Terry Barlow
> <twb176@y...> wrote:
> > ::WindRider::
> > He ran through the hatch and stopped beside
> Battera,
> > attempting to catch his breath. He looked out
> across
> > the African landscape. "By the Matrix", he
> thought,
> > "this planet is beautiful!" But then a sobering
> > thought came to him. "And all it will take to
> destroy
> > it is a few stupid war-mongering bots."
> > 
> 
> 
>
